data.question: What is the empirical formula of DTO MOF?
data.answer: C48 H27 N2 O8 Zn2 C

data.question: Which MOF has the highest calculated pore diameter according to Figure S13?
Is the crystal system of BTO MOF monoclinic?
What is the space group of DBTO MOF?
Does grinding DBTO MOF decrease its kinetic selectivity for propene over propane?
What method was used to calculate the surface areas of the MOFs?
Which MOF did not adsorb N2 according to Figure S4?
Is the formula weight of BTO MOF 1121.45?
What is the role of the TMS group in determining the kinetic selectivities of the MOFs?
data.answer: It modulates the widths of channels terminating at the low-area crystal faces and plays a small role in determining the relative selectivities.

data.question: Did the synthesis of all four MOFs involve solvothermal methods?
What is the main structural contributor to the kinetic selectivities of BTO and DBTO MOFs?
data.answer: The large bromine atoms in L2

data.question: Which MOF has the smallest pore diameters according to the calculated plots in Figure S13?
Is the crystal color of DTO MOF yellow?

Does the SEM image of ground DBTO-MOF suggest that side faces become more prevalent after grinding?
What is the goodness-of-fit on F2 for the DTO MOF?
Did the synthesis of L3 involve the use of potassium carbonate?
What is the role of iodine (I2) in the synthesis of 3-bromo-4-[2-(4’-pyridinyl)ethenyl]pyridine?
data.answer: It is used for the isomerization process.

data.question: Is the crystal system of DTO MOF monoclinic?
What is the empirical formula of BTO MOF?
data.answer: C51 H34 Br2 N2 O8 Si Zn2
